resources.string:
Your name is Swil, you live in a mountain village on the outskirts of Balmont capital thrives Uggarden. 

The country alone takes years but after your fifteenth birthday hear rumors of this. 

It is forming a terrible army of monsters to destroy everything in its path. An advanced army in the village looking for something forces you to escape. 

Your Thyre brother is sacrificed and is covering for the shoulders while still heading down into the woods forced to leave behind friends and family without being able to know what has happened.
Ups! seems like you can\'t cross.
Are you sure you want exit of the game?\n (may have content that is not saved)
